column1: '''Andúnië''' was an important city and port in the realm of [[Númenor]].
It was located on the [[Bay of Andúnië]] in the [[Andustar]] region, on the western end of [[Elenna]].<ref>{{UT
column2: NMap}}</ref>  Part of the town lay beside the shore but many dwellings were set upon the steeps slopes behind.
